title: Terrifying Power (Part 2)
body:
Terrifying Power (Part 2)

---) Crimson Veil (Unique Skill): Using the blood lightning as the medium the user can become partially incorporeal. While in this state, the user can phase through obstacles and attacks. This state will last for fifteen seconds. The power of skills increases by 150% while the user is in a partially incorporeal state. Cool Down Time: Six Hours.

Just when the thousands of attacks were about to hit him, Evan used the second effect of the growth link skill once again and took the unique skill of Albelu.

As he activated the Crimson Veil skill, his body became partially incorporeal and he phased through all the attacks that were coming towards him. At the same time, the power of his skills increased by another 150%

Now, along with the effect of BloodLust skill, all of his skills were receiving a boost of 450%

After ignoring the attacks launched by Demons and Monsters, Evan used Flickr Steps and arrived above the middle of the army in an instant.
